The countless gods of Shinto-%K%P
In Japan, people have long believed that gods are\npresent in all things.%K%P
They reside in even the tiniest objects. In all the\nworld there are more gods than can even be\ncounted.%K%P
And then, a few years ago all these gods appeared\nbefore the eyes of humans.%K%P
In a phenomenon called the Descent of the Gods,\ncountless goddesses descended to earth.%K%P
Being ignorant of the ways of this world, it was\nonly natural that these goddesses caused chaos.%K%P
As this sudden event caused great confusion,\nthe government quickly enacted the Myriad\nGod Measure.%K%P
Unfortunately, these efforts couldn't end the\nchaos, so the Divine Education Act was implemented\nby Amaterasu Omikami.%K%P
Since then, most goddesses had settled nicely\ninto human society as peaceful neighbors.%K%P
However, there were some who\ndefied the Divine Education Act\nand who continue to live as they willed.%K%P
Some goddesses simply do whatever they want,\nwhenever they want.%K%P
Those who cause harm to people are known as Aragami.%K%P
'Just shut up already!\nQuit going on about 'rehab, rehab,'\nlike it's the only word you know!'%K%P
'You reeeally are a worthless pain-in-the-butt\ngoddess!'%K%P
'Huh? You want a piece of me?!\nYou'd rather me bow and scrape for you!'%K%P
Two goddesses were in the middle of a fight\nright in front of me.%K%P
It'd been a few years since the goddesses\nfirst descended.%K%P
Some of those mixed into human society have lent\na helping hand, showing the way it ought to be.%K%P
For goddesses, the good will and thoughts of humans\nbecomes Sakimitama, a source of power.%K%P
The goddesses who try to gather it work to help \npeople, and generally have gentle personalities.%K%P
However, the two goddesses in front of me\ndidn't seem that way in the slightest,\nin fact, they were the opposite.%K%P
The lights in the room flickered incessantly, and\nwhat should've been a sunny day turned into a\nrainy one.%K%P
'Pshaw! Like I'd ever listen to a dirt goddess\nlike you!'%K%P
'Dirt goddess?!\nOh, it is ON now!'%K%P
The goddesses were fighting like kids.%K%P
Wait, were they actually goddesses...?%K%P
'Hah, you're just mad because it's true,\nyou're such a little brat!'%K%P
'Oh, I'm a little brat?!\nYou're the one who throws a tantrum\nevery time you don't get your way!'%K%P
'Shove it, little Miss Conformity!'%K%P
'C-Conformity?!\nI'm going to get you rehabilitated\nno matter what!'%K%P
'Psh! Bring it on, if you think you can handle me!'%K%P
The argument intensified and showed no sign\nof stopping.%K%P
'Can I really find a way to end this argument \nbetween goddesses...?'%K%P
